title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-03] [$250] Workspace - Admin can access member details side bar after member leaves workspace
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Navigate to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Invite user B to a workspace
3. Open the side bar for the invited member on the admin side
4. As the member leave the workspace
5. Refresh the page for both the member and the admin

Expected result: The side bar for the member should not be accessible after member leaves a workspace

Actual result: None
